title.native: アイカツスターズ！ 星のツバサ

description:
Yume Nijino is in a pinch!? A luxury school idol cruise liner called Venus Ark has suddenly appeared! And the perfect idol who leads this ship is "Elza Forte"!! While traveling around the world, she gathered the most excellent idols and brands she could find. And now she has set her eyes on her next target, Yume Nijino of Four Star Academy.

(Source: Aikatsu Stars! Wiki)
hashtag: #アイカツ #aikatsu #アイカツスターズ

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Dinosaurs
tags.description: Prominently features Dinosaurs, prehistoric reptiles that went extinct millions of years ago.

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

alternative: Blooming Ice Flower of the Stage

Natsumi Tadano is a Japanese lyricist.

A composer affiliated with [MONACA](https://anilist.co/staff/110481/MONACA) since spring 2008.

edges.role: Insert Song Performance ("Bokura no Kiseki"; ep 19)

node.description:
**Height:** 170 cm
__Dialect:__ Osaka dialect / Iyo dialect
__Hobby:__ Walk, write poetry
__Special skill:__ Speed ​​reading
__Qualification:__ Kanji test semi-level 2 / English test semi-level 2
__Career:__ Graduated from Professional Fit Voice Actor Training Center
Received “New Actor Award” at the 12th Seiyu Award in 2018.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/holy_yell0525/) | [Website (Band)](http://kiramune.jp/artist/SparQlew/) | [Profile (Pro Fit)](http://www.pro-fit.co.jp/talent_horie.html)

**Non anime roles:**
- Aether - Genshin Impact (Video Game)

node.description:
__[Archived Profle (onetrap)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/minamida_kengo)__

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan

__Kengo Minamida__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer, sound producer and arranger, who works as a creator for the creative musical unit onetrap (2008-).
